completed_features: Initialize Next.js 14 project structure with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS configuration, including `package.json`, `tsconfig.json`, `next.config.js`, `tailwind.config.ts`, `postcss.config.js`, and the basic `app/` directory (root layout and page).
Implement the Data Layer by creating `app/lib/types.ts` to define interfaces (User, Stats, Boat, Post, Template, Social) and `app/lib/dummy.ts` to populate these interfaces with static mock data.
last_commit:
feat: implement data layer with types and dummy data

Create app/lib/types.ts defining all TypeScript interfaces (User, Stats, Boat, Post, Template, Social) and app/lib/dummy.ts with static mock data exports. This establishes the data foundation for the boat-broker social media autoposter dashboard.
